questions.title: Question 1 for Class CLIMATE102_190916
questions.main: The density of water vapor in a given parcel of air is expressed by the:

questions.title: Question 2 for Class CLIMATE102_190916
questions.main: If very cold air is brought indoors and warmed with no change in its moisture  content the saturation vapor pressure of this air will ____ and the relative  humidity of this air will ____.

questions.title: Question 3 for Class CLIMATE102_190916
questions.main: When the air temperature increases the saturation vapor pressure will:

mcq.option: D) vary over an increasingly broad range of values

questions.title: Question 4 for Class CLIMATE102_190916
questions.main: When the air temperature is below freezing the saturation vapor pressure over water  is ________.
questions.answer: C) greater than the saturation vapor pressure over ice

mcq.option: B) less than the saturation vapor pressure over ice
C) greater than the saturation vapor pressure over ice
D) equal to the saturation vapor pressure over ice

questions.title: Question 5 for Class CLIMATE102_190916
questions.main: When the air is saturated which of the following statements is not correct?
questions.answer: D) an increase in temperature will cause condensation to occur

mcq.option: A) the air temperature equals the wet-bulb temperature
C) the air temperature equals the dew point temperature
D) an increase in temperature will cause condensation to occur
E) the wet bulb temperature equals the dew point temperature

questions.title: Question 6 for Class CLIMATE102_190916
questions.main: A high water vapor pressure indicates:
questions.answer: A) a relatively large number of water vapor molecules in the air

mcq.option: A) a relatively large number of water vapor molecules in the air
B) a relatively small number of water vapor molecules in the air
C) a relatively high rate of evaporation
D) an abundant supply of condensation nuclei in the air

questions.title: Question 7 for Class CLIMATE102_190916
questions.main: Which of the following is the best indicator of the actual amount of water vapor in the air?

questions.title: Question 8 for Class CLIMATE102_190916
questions.main: Which of the following statements is not correct?
questions.answer: C) The relative humidity is a measure of the air's actual water vapor content.

mcq.option: A) The length of human hair changes as the relative humidity changes.
B) During the winter, low relative humidity can irritate the mucus membranes in the nose and throat.
C) The relative humidity is a measure of the air's actual water vapor content.
D) A change in the air temperature can change the relative humidity.

questions.title: Question 9 for Class CLIMATE102_190916
questions.main: A halo around the sun or moon indicates that rain may be on the way because the halo indicates:
questions.answer: B) a warm front may be approaching

mcq.option: A) a cold front may be approaching
B) a warm front may be approaching
C) a sharp drop in atmospheric pressure
D) a sudden rise in surface dew point temperature

questions.title: Question 10 for Class CLIMATE102_190916
questions.main: The maximum pressure that water vapor molecules would exert if the air were saturated is called the:
